titles.title: Recognizing the results of the free and fair elections for the new Members of the Legislative Assembly of the Falkland Islands held on November 9, 2017.
Recognizing the results of the free and fair elections for the new Members of the Legislative Assembly of the Falkland Islands held on November 9, 2017.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Welcomes the democratic elections of the Falkland Islands.
Acknowledges that only the people of the Falkland Islands can determine their future.
Recognizes the United Kingdom's sovereignty over the Falkland Islands for as long as the islands desire to remain a self-governing overseas territory.
